title: Vintage Filter
aboutDescription: Vintage filter creates an aged, retro look by combining faded colors, grain, vignetting, and light leaks to simulate old film photography.

sections.title: Vintage Effect Components
content: Faded Colors: Reduced saturation for aged appearance
Film Grain: Adds texture like old film stock
Color Shifts: Warm or cool tones for period looks

sections.title: Popular Vintage Styles
content: 1970s: Warm tones, high contrast, orange/brown hues
1980s: Faded pastels, soft focus, pink/purple tints
Polaroid: Instant film look with characteristic borders
Film Noir: High contrast black and white
Cross-processed: Unusual color shifts and high saturation
